ResearchProjectDef.label: Stellar Genetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the incredible superconductive properties of Starsteel, we can upgrade our genetics equipment to create even more powerful xenotypes.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Genetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: With the advances that Cosmic Matter brings in energy manipulation, we can further increase the potential of our genetics equipment.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Project ALTER
ResearchProjectDef.description: Eternium is an incredible material. What better way to use it, than to perfect ourselves?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cosmic Wastepack Atomizer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cosmic Matter has a lot of wonderful properties. We can use it to speed up the destruction of hazardous waste.
